koi_score.description: A value between 0 and 1 that indicates the confidence in the KOI disposition

koi_period.description: The interval between consecutive planetary transits.

koi_impact.description: The sky-projected distance between the center of the stellar disc and the center of the planet disc at conjunction, normalized by the stellar radius.

koi_duration.description: The duration of the observed transits. Duration is measured from first contact between the planet and star until last contact.

koi_depth.description: The fraction of stellar flux lost at the minimum of the planetary transit.

koi_prad.description: The radius of the planet. Planetary radius is the product of the planet star radius ratio and the stellar radius.

koi_teq.description: Approximation for the temperature of the planet

koi_max_sngle_ev.description: The maximum calculated value of the Single Event Statistic

koi_max_mult_ev.description: The maximum calculated value of the Multiple Event Statistic

koi_model_snr.description: Model Signal-to-Noise Ratio - Quality of detection

koi_count.description: Number of planet candidates identified in a system.

koi_num_transits.description: The number of expected transits or partially-observed transits associated with the planet candidate occurring within the searched light curve.

koi_bin_oedp_sig.description: Binary Discrimination Test - Eclipsing binary test

koi_steff.description: The photospheric temperature of the star.

koi_slogg.description: Stellar Surface Gravity (log g) - Host star gravity

koi_srad.description: The photospheric radius of the star

koi_fwm_stat_sig.description: Indicates whether there is a statistically significant flux-weighted offset between in-transit and out-of-transit images.

koi_fwm_prao.description: The calculated Right Ascension offset of the transiting or eclipsing object from the KIC location of the target star.

koi_fwm_pdeco.description: The calculated Declination offset of the transiting or eclipsing object from the KIC location of the target star.

koi_dicco_mra.description: The angular offset in the RA (J2000) direction between the best-fit PRF centroids from the Out-Of-Transit image and the Difference Image by averaging the weighted single-quarter measurements.

koi_dicco_msky.description: The angular offset on the plane of the sky between the best-fit PRF centroids from the Out-Of-Transit image and the Difference Image by averaging the weighted single-quarter measurements

koi_dikco_mra.description: The angular offset in the RA (J2000) direction between the best-fit PRF centroids from the difference image and the Kepler Input Catalog position by averaging the weighted single-quarter measurements
